As of today bamlanivimab/etesivimab no longer appropriate for Covid therapy in the US.   

This is based on the fact that proportion of cases caused by the beta variant (P1) that is resistant to bam/ete exceeds 11%

Regen-COV and Sotrovimab can still be used.

2/ There were 132 physician deaths due to COVID-19 from 28 states between March and November 2020

IMG death rate was 1.80 times higher than the national average among practicing physicians.   

Majority of deaths were in primary care physicians.

1/ International Medical Graduate Physicians who account for 25% of practicing physicians in the US accounted for 45% of physician COVID deaths.

https://t.co/YNtMeAXHKK via @JAMANetworkOpen part of @JAMANetwork

4/ UK study showed 88% protection from symptomatic COVID against delta variant with 2 doses of Pfizer; 66% with Astra Zeneca vaccine. With 1 dose, protection was 33%. This study is specific to delta variant, & endpoint was symptomatic COVID. Not ICU care. https://t.co/7YWWJ8pMQ5
